section.p: Evaluating the fluid used to clean the wound or body organ when flushing or washing out with water or a medicated solution.

ol.li:
Contains exactly one [1..1] amtUsed with data type Physical Quantity
Contains the total amount of irrigation solution used in the operative site.

Contains exactly one [1..1] id with data type Id
Unique identifier for the type of irrigation fluid used.
